cardContent.title: Learn More
cardContent.description: If you want to learn more about me, chat with Behalf Bot — a GPT-4 chatbot I created to answer questions on my behalf using info from this website and my LinkedIn.

cardContent.title: Get in Touch
cardContent.description: If you'd like to get in touch for whatever reason, you can send me a message on LinkedIn — or you can shoot me an email (click to copy).
